official_title: IIT2023-09-Chung-UpfrontTAD: Upfront TAD/SNB in Patients with Clinical T1-2N0 ER+ Her2- Breast Cancer with Ultrasound Detected Nodal Metastases
inclusion_criteria:
* Women age â‰¥ 45
* Clinical T1-2N0 ER+ invasive breast cancer
* US detected biopsy proven axillary nodal disease
* Written informed consent obtained from subject and ability for subject to comply with the requirements of the study.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 45 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Palpable nodes on physical exam
* Her2+ or ER- invasive breast cancer
* Extranodal extension > 3 mm on nodal biopsy
* More than 2 suspicious nodes on preoperative imaging
